args: I can't believe how much that dumb bird\npecked meâ€”I've got holes everywhere.
Still, I'd better check and make sure\nhe didn't peck any of the cupcakes!
Well, crud. These are a total disaster.\nThe frosting's smeared all over the box,\nand most of the cakes are smushed.
(Every single part of my plan\nis now officially a disaster.)
(I should just give up now while\nI'm still very, very behind.)
(I guess my master will never know\nhow grateful I am for him...)
(No. You can't give up now, Melody.\nThere has to be some other way!)
So if sweaters and cupcakes and lap naps\nwon't work, I'll just have to use WORDS!
Master?! What are you doing\nall the way out here?
Looking for you! Some townsfolk told\nme you came out this way. What in the\nheck HAPPENED to you?
Just another patented Melody klutz\nmoment. But please, master, there's\nsomething that I have to tell you.
Well, it's a simple little thing,\nbut I REALLY mean it...
Thank you SO much for everything\nthat you've done for me!
For giving me a place to work as a maid,\nand for reminding me that I have my\nstrengths, even though I often forget.
And for giving me the warmth of family\nthat I've long been searching for.
All of those things are so important to me,\nand you made them possible.
So I just want you to know that I'm the\nmost grateful person in the WORLD.
Oh no, I'm sorry. Did I get carried away?\nI didn't mean to upset you!
But the moment just seemed right,\nso I had to tell you.
Aaaanyway, I guess we should head back\nbefore people start to worry.
Wait. I have something to say to you.
Uh oh. Am I fired? I'm fired, aren't it?
No, you're not fired. I just want you to\nknow that I'm very grateful for you.
And I want to thank you for always doing\nyour absolute best in the castle to make\nsure everyone is happy and satisfied.

Sure, you mess up from time to timeâ€”
and tend to break more than the average
amount of thingsâ€”but it's only because
you give your all every single day.
The size of your failures is due to the\nsize of your feelings. I know that.
M-Melody? What's wrong?\nDid that come out badly?
This'll stop in a second, I promise.\nWhere'd I put that handkerchief...?
Uh oh. You dropped that box. Let me just...\nEr, what's IN here, anyway? And why does\nit look like something attacked it?
There's a card on it... ï¼‚For my master.ï¼‚\nWait, are these for me?
But I dropped the box and got attacked\nby a bird, so they're a total mess.
Please just pretend you never saw it!
Or you could just give them to me\nlike you originally intended.
Nothing is a disaster if you put your\nown hard work and care into them.
Well, you're not wrongâ€”these are so\nbanged up, it looks like Ranzal might\nhave made them. Still...
Master, no! Please don't force\nyourself to eat those!
Oh, I'm not. They look a mess,\nbut they taste fantastic.

It's just like with your usual clumsiness.
No matter how much you might mess up,
the people you're toiling away for always
know how much you care about them.
You're always so warm and kind to me,\nand I like you very much.
(He LIKES me?! He said that, right?!\nI'm not hearing this?!)
(Okay, calm down, Melody! He didn't mean\nhe LIKE likes you, just that he ï¼‚likesï¼‚ you.\nDon't go making this weird.)
No! I mean yes! I mean,\nI AM TOTALLY CALM!
Riiight. Maybe we should head back now.\nYou're awfully flushed, and I don't want\nyou coming down with something.

YES, LET'S GO BACK RIGHT NOW!
If we stay together just the two of us
like this, I'm pretty sure my heart is
going to explode!
Uh oh! You're not actually having\nheart problems, are you?!
Are you SURE you're all right?
We were rather worried about you,\nand more than a little curious.\nSo how did it go?
Was it a success? A failure? Does he\nknow the depths of your gratitude now?!
Still, I think the only reason I pulled it off\nwas because I wanted him to understand\nhow the two of you feel.
I really am grateful for you bothâ€”\nas grateful as I am to my master.

Sweet! Oh, and because I helped you so
much, I can totally count on you to help
mediate my relationship with the prince
next time, right? Riiiight?
I'm eager and excited to help you\nin any way I can!
Uh oh. She's definitely going to\nmake a mess of things.
Well, until that happens, let us celebrate\nthe success of Melody's day trip.
Yesss! Girls' night! I gotta go get ready!
As do I. Melody, perhaps you'd like to\nchange and wait for us anon?
Whew! I can't believe everything\nthat happened today...
(But now I understand just how important\nit is to share your feelings with the people\nwho ought to know them.)
(Although maybe I'll leave out that one\nparticular feeling when I tell Philia! Ha!)
(It's a special feeling that you don't feel\nwith family members...)
That intense pounding in my heart...
